H0.text: Lawrence Sheriff founded which famous school in 1567. Harrow School

H1.text: Lawrence Sheriff founded which famous school in 1567. Eton College

H2.text: Lawrence Sheriff founded which famous school in 1567. Charterhouse School

H3.text: Lawrence Sheriff founded which famous school in 1567. Rugby

A4.text: Rugby School was founded in 1567 as a provision in the will of Lawrence Sheriff, who had made his fortune supplying groceries to Queen Elizabeth I of England.

A5.text: Sheriff had drawn up a will which stipulated that his fortune should be used to found almshouses and a free grammar school 'to serve chiefly for the children of Rugby and Brownsover... and next for such as be of other places hereunto adjoyneing'.
